ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The people of al-Hijr denied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The people of Al-Hijr denied Our apostles;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely the people of al-Hijr also rejected the Messengers, calling them liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: People of Hijr rejected the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the people of the Hijr (rocks) denied the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, the Dwellers of Al-Hijr denied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the dwellers of the Rock certainly rejected the apostles;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The dwellers in El-Hijr cried lies to the Envoys.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the dwellers in Al-Hijr denied (Our) messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The people of al-Hijr also rejected Our messengers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly the dwellers of Hijr belied the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly the inhabitants of Hijr denied the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Companions of the Rocky Tract also rejected the messengers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, the dwellers of Al-Hijr (the rocky tract) denied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And the dwellers of Al Hijr also belied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The people of the Rock also rejected the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:80] And verily the dwellers in al-Hijr — a valley between Medina and Syria — namely, [the tribe of] Thamūd, denied those who had been sent [by God], when they denied [the prophet] Sālih, as this constituted a denial of the other messengers, since they all shared the fact that they came with [the Message proclaiming] the Oneness of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And the dwellers in Al-Hijr) the people of Salih (indeed denied (Our) messengers) Salih and all the other messengers.
